description.fr: Lorsque vous déclenchez {NamedEffect:455}\_: Votre héros gagne {value:Weapon.919.s, percent} de son {%AT} en {%AR} en plus.
description.en: When you trigger {NamedEffect:455}: Your hero gains {value:Weapon.919.s, percent} of their {%AT} as extra {%AR}.

description.de: Wenn du {NamedEffect:455} auslöst: Dein Held erhält zusätzlich {value:Weapon.919.s, percent} seiner {%AT} als {%AR}.
description.pt: Ao acionar {NamedEffect:455}: Seu herói ganha mais {value:Weapon.919.s, percent} do seu {%AT} em {%AR}.
